ExtraMythicAbility.Description: Adds Extra Mythic Ability as a normal feat.

ExtraMythicFeat.Description: Adds Extra Mythic Feat as a normal feat.

AbundantPreparation.Description: Adds a mythic ability that grants 4 additional praparation slots for arcanists for 1st, 2nd, and 3rd levels.

AbundantPreparationImproved.Description: Adds a mythic ability that grants 4 additional praparation slots for arcanists for 4th, 5th, and 6th levels.

AbundantPreparationGreater.Description: Adds a mythic ability that grants 4 additional praparation slots for arcanists for 7th, 8th, and 9th levels.

MageArmor2.Description: Adds a new spell Mage Armor II that grants +6 AC.

MageArmor3.Description: Adds a new spell Mage Armor III that grants +8 AC.

MageArmor4.Description: Adds a new spell Mage Armor IV that grants +10 AC.

MageShield2.Description: Adds a new spell Shield II that lasts for an hour per level.
